Room.Name: Orchard Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Orchard Lane, north of the Healer's Eye.
Room.LongDescription: The Healer's Eye is a small healing shop on the south side of the road. The healers there will help you recover from whatever accidents or battles you might have been in, and do not charge for their services. On the north side of the road is the Brunskid Trader's Guild, a place where many goods trade hands, some of questionable origin.
